title: panicked at 'assertion failed: type_is_zero_size(bcx.ccx(), block_ty)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
rustc 0.13.0-nightly (ffc111889 2014-12-12 21:07:19 +0000)
Linux mint 64

